frontmatter.title: Urban Aboriginal Ministry
frontmatter.description: The Urban Aboriginal Ministry is a ministry of St. Mary Magdelene Anglican Church and supports Prayer Circles, Four Annual Feasts: Easter, Thanksgiving, Winterfest, and Christmas, Traditional as well as Ceremonies and Pastoral Care.

frontmatter.title: Static Site Portfolio
frontmatter.description: This portfolio showcases projects I have worked on. Built with Gatsby this sub site is served up with static files from a Google Cloud Platform storage bucket. Gatsby is a great starting place for learning React for new and seasoned developers alike and it is a blast to work with.

frontmatter.title: Humane Typography in the Digital Age
frontmatter.description: This is a sample post from the orignal starter blog found on https://www.gatsbyjs.org . An Essay on Typography by Eric Gill takes the reader back to the year 1930. The year when a conflict between two worlds came to its term. The machines of the industrial world finally took over the handicrafts.
